screener.question: How recognizable is your business at a glance—especially compared to your competitors? Think about your trucks, signs, cards, website, and social media.

options.label: A. We stand out with a strong, consistent look
B. We have a logo, but our look isn't consistent or polished
C. We're hard to tell apart from other contractors
D. We don't really have any branding yet

followUp.question: If you could upgrade one branding item next, what would it be?

options.label: A. Truck wraps
B. Yard signs / uniforms
C. Website refresh
D. Social media look

gold_nuggets.A: ✨ **Strong branding can increase your close rate by 23% because customers trust contractors who look professional and established.**
gold_nuggets.B: ✨ **Consistent branding across all touchpoints makes you 3x more memorable to potential customers than competitors with mixed messaging.**
gold_nuggets.C: ✨ **78% of homeowners say they're more likely to call a contractor who stands out visually from the competition.**
gold_nuggets.D: ✨ **Professional branding can justify 15-20% higher pricing because customers associate polished presentation with quality work.**

screener.question: When someone in your area searches for your services, how easily can they find you online?

options.label: A. We show up on the first page consistently
B. We show up sometimes, but not consistently
C. We're buried on page 2 or beyond
D. I'm not sure where we show up

followUp.question: What's your biggest challenge with local visibility right now?

options.label: A. Google Business Profile needs work
B. Not enough online reviews
C. Website doesn't rank well
D. Competition dominates search results

gold_nuggets.A: ✨ **75% of local searches result in calls within 24 hours—your strong visibility is a huge competitive advantage.**
gold_nuggets.B: ✨ **Businesses that show up consistently in local search get 70% more calls than those with sporadic visibility.**
gold_nuggets.C: ✨ **92% of consumers don't look past the first page of search results, so improving your ranking is critical.**
gold_nuggets.D: ✨ **Local contractors who track and optimize their online presence grow 40% faster than those who don't.**

screener.question: How reliably do you capture leads from calls, forms, and messages?

options.label: A. We capture and log almost everything
B. We miss a few here and there
C. We miss a lot during busy times
D. We don't have a process

followUp.question: Where do most leads slip through?

options.label: A. Missed calls
B. Website forms
C. Text / social DMs
D. No central system

gold_nuggets.A: ✨ **Contractors who capture 95%+ of leads typically convert 40% more prospects than those who miss calls and messages.**
gold_nuggets.B: ✨ **Every missed lead costs contractors an average of $847 in potential revenue—small leaks add up fast.**
gold_nuggets.C: ✨ **67% of leads will call your competitor if you don't respond within the first hour of their inquiry.**
gold_nuggets.D: ✨ **Systematic lead capture can increase your close rate by 25% because you never lose track of warm prospects.**

screener.question: What best describes your follow-up after an estimate is sent?

options.label: A. Automated + personal follow-up until closed
B. We follow up once or twice
C. We rarely follow up unless they reach out first
D. We don't have a process

followUp.question: Which follow-up step would you most like to automate?

options.label: A. Day-1 reminder
B. 3–5 day check-in
C. 2-week nurture
D. Rehash for lost quotes

gold_nuggets.A: ✨ **Systematic follow-up can increase your close rate by 50% because most contractors give up after one or two attempts.**
gold_nuggets.B: ✨ **80% of sales require 5+ follow-up touches, but most contractors stop after the second attempt.**
gold_nuggets.C: ✨ **Contractors who implement consistent follow-up systems typically see a 30% increase in revenue within 90 days.**
gold_nuggets.D: ✨ **The average contractor loses $45,000 annually by not having a follow-up system for estimates and quotes.**

screener.question: How consistent are you at getting new public reviews (Google, FB, etc.)?

options.label: A. Steady stream every month
B. Occasional bursts after big jobs
C. Rarely, only when clients feel like it
D. We don't ask for reviews

followUp.question: What's the biggest blocker to more reviews?

options.label: A. Team forgets to ask
B. No easy link / process
C. Afraid of bad reviews
D. Not a priority

gold_nuggets.A: ✨ **Contractors with 50+ Google reviews typically charge 18% more than competitors with fewer than 10 reviews.**
gold_nuggets.B: ✨ **88% of consumers trust online reviews as much as personal recommendations from friends.**
gold_nuggets.C: ✨ **Just 5 new reviews per month can move you ahead of 70% of your local competition.**
gold_nuggets.D: ✨ **Systematic review collection can increase your lead volume by 35% because you'll rank higher and look more trustworthy.**

screener.question: How quickly can a new lead get on your calendar (estimate or service)?

options.label: A. Same day or next day
B. Within 3–5 days
C. 1–2 weeks out
D. 2+ weeks out

followUp.question: What would most help you speed up scheduling?

options.label: A. Online scheduling
B. Better triage / qualification
C. More crew capacity
D. Calendar integration

gold_nuggets.A: ✨ **Fast scheduling is a huge competitive advantage—leads are 5x more likely to choose contractors who can start quickly.**
gold_nuggets.B: ✨ **Same-week scheduling typically converts 40% better than contractors who are 2+ weeks out.**
gold_nuggets.C: ✨ **Long scheduling delays signal success, but they can cost you 25% of potential leads who need faster service.**
gold_nuggets.D: ✨ **Being booked solid is great, but smart scheduling systems help you capture leads for future availability.**

screener.question: How would you describe your current business operations and team management?

options.label: A. We have clear systems and processes that run smoothly
B. We have some systems but they need improvement
C. Everything depends on me being involved
D. It's mostly chaos and we're just trying to keep up

followUp.question: What's your biggest operational challenge right now?

options.label: A. Keeping track of jobs and deadlines
B. Team coordination and communication
C. Customer communication and updates
D. Paperwork and administrative tasks

gold_nuggets.A: ✨ **Contractors with systematized operations grow 3x faster and report 60% less stress than those without clear processes.**
gold_nuggets.B: ✨ **Improving your systems now will pay dividends—every hour spent on organization saves 5 hours of firefighting later.**
gold_nuggets.C: ✨ **Owner-dependent businesses hit a revenue ceiling around $500K—systems and delegation are the keys to breaking through.**
gold_nuggets.D: ✨ **Chaos might feel normal, but organized contractors typically earn 40% more while working 20% fewer hours.**

screener.question: What's your biggest frustration or goal for your business right now?

options.label: A. I want to grow bigger and hire more people
B. I want more consistent, higher-quality leads
C. I want to work less while maintaining income
D. I just want to get more organized and professional

followUp.question: What's the main thing holding you back from achieving that goal?

options.label: A. Don't have enough time to work ON the business
B. Don't know which marketing actually works
C. Can't afford to hire help or buy tools
D. Overwhelmed by all the options and don't know where to start

gold_nuggets.A: ✨ **Contractors who systematically work ON their business (not just IN it) typically double their revenue within 18 months.**
gold_nuggets.B: ✨ **The most successful contractors focus on 2-3 marketing channels that actually work rather than trying everything at once.**
gold_nuggets.C: ✨ **Smart contractors invest in tools that pay for themselves—the right system can generate 5-10x ROI within the first year.**
gold_nuggets.D: ✨ **Starting with the basics (capture, follow-up, reviews) gives you 80% of the results with 20% of the complexity.**
